na menaniwan kana vuwa’ i ngidiran na tawki marengay, “nangku re’a di lupas salaw tavu’, kadika cima’ saeman” kema.
The owner of the nearby fruit stand said: “My pineapples and peaches are very sweet. Buy some!”
我今天七點到學校。: 旁邊水果攤的老闆說:「我的鳳梨和桃子很甜。買一些吧!」

cimima’ mi da re’a di lupas.
We bought pineapples and peaches.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們買了鳳梨和桃子。

makalrang mi kana menaniwan da tiwngan, marengay na tawki “cacima’ mu da eman? ulra a ma’idang di semver na vuyu harem, sasaya mu, telu leman.’’ kema.
We passed the meat stall, and the boss said, “What do you want to buy? Today's chickens are big and fat, and one is 300 NTD.”
我今天七點到學校。: 我們經過了肉攤，老闆說:「你要買什麼? 今天的雞又大又肥，一隻300元。」

padangal dadu kema i mulri na vavayan, kiumalr kana tawki karuwa diya kemadulu? kema.
Grandma thought it was too expensive and asked the boss if it could be cheaper.
我今天七點到學校。: 奶奶覺得太貴了，問老闆可不可以便宜一點。

aymu, madulu lra kema na tawki, adi muwai lemehec.
But the boss said that it is already very cheap and cannot be reduced any further.
我今天七點到學校。: 但老闆說已經很便宜，不能再減了。

tu ’udar na tawki marengay, kadika cima’ kanangku vulraw, nangku vulraw ma’idang di madulu kema.
The boss next door said, come and buy my fish, my fish is big and cheap.
我今天七點到學校。: 隔壁的老闆說，來買我的魚，我的魚又大又便宜。

likudan lra cimima’ mi lra da vuyu di vulraw, muruma’ mi demeru mi da matemuy a tu na siyaw.
In the end we bought chicken and fish, and went home to cook a table of food.
我今天七點到學校。: 最後我們買了雞也買了魚，回家煮了一桌子的菜。

mangala mi sawariyan, ’aremeng lra na wari.
After waiting for a long time, it was already dark.
我今天七點到學校。: 等了好久，天已經黑了。

padingwa pukuwani marengay i wadi pakunamun lra da adi karuwa semede’ i hitayan kema. nu masalr lra na kasede’an mu, karuwa ku lra muruma’ kema.
The younger brother called back and said that the army suddenly couldn't take a vacation and would not be back until the next Sunday.
我今天七點到學校。: 弟弟打電話過來說，軍隊突然不能放假了，要下一個禮拜日我才能回來。

sakuwani lra na dineruwan di uwa sa’ulu papiya mukasaya ta mekan nu kemadu. kema i mulri na vavayan.
Grandma said that she has cooked so much, so let's eat together!
我今天七點到學校。: 奶奶說已經煮了這麼多，叫大家一起來吃吧!

sema’ul mi da wadadiyan, mukasa mi mekan kanani na imaran na keraraviyan.
We invited friends and family to have a great dinner together.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們邀請了親朋好友，一起來享用豐盛的晚餐。

ulra ku lralrang temakesi i Capang, marayas malalup miinada da eman diya.
I have a classmate named Capang, he often forgets to bring things.
我今天七點到學校。: 我有一個同學叫Capang，他常常忘記帶東西。

nu takakesi ta mu, kivelas kana lralrang da impic, aicer, melri mu, mau na vavalrayan.
During class, he borrowed pencils, erasers or notebooks from his classmates.
我今天七點到學校。: 上課的時候，他跟同學借鉛筆、橡皮擦或是筆記本。

parasan, parepuwan, paretelun, tu pavelasay papiya kanintaw.
Once, twice, three times, everyone would lend him something.
我今天七點到學校。: 一次、兩次、三次，大家會借東西給他。

aymu, kuwaceng nantu kakuwayanan, marayas kivelas da eman diya di, ma’ulid paveliyas.
But he has a bad habit of often borrowing things but not returning them.
我今天七點到學校。: 但是他有個壞習慣，經常借了東西卻不還。

likudan lra adi lra maranger pavelas da eman diya kanintaw.
In the end, no one wanted to borrow anything from him.
我今天七點到學校。: 最後大家都不想借他東西了。

ulra a saya wari, mukuwa mi kivangavanga papiya.
One day, we all went on an outing together.
我今天七點到學校。: 有一天，我們大家一起去郊遊。

kadu i dadalan, maranger muca’iya i Capang, malalup diya miinada da ciligami.
On the way, Capang wanted to go to the bathroom, but he forgot to bring toilet paper.
我今天七點到學校。: 路途中，Capang想上廁所，但他忘記帶衛生紙。

kivavelas kana lralrang da ciligami mu, tumuvang papiya kantaw, adi ku miinada tu kuwayaw.
He borrowed toilet paper from his classmates, but everyone told him that I didn’t bring them either.
我今天七點到學校。: 他跟同學借衛生紙的時候，大家都回他說，我沒有帶，這樣告訴他。

macangis tu helran, ’ilremes marengay, man adi mu muwai pavelas kaningku da ciligami papiya?
Capang burst into tears. He said angrily, why don’t everyone lend me toilet paper!
我今天七點到學校。: Capang急的哭了出來。他生氣的說，為什你們大家都不借我衛生紙?

tu tuvangaw na lralrang, alra adi u muwai minada, pawnung nu kivelas u diya mu, adi u pavaveliyas.
The classmate told him, because you didn’t bring it yourself, and you wouldn’t return the things lent to you!
我今天七點到學校。: 同學告訴他，因為你都不自己帶，而且借給你的東西，你都不會還!

adu kana ’emanan mukuwa i kungkuwan, semavalr meredek lra i Capang i kungkuwan. tu paveliyasaw kana lralrang kanantu kinivelas diya na eman diya.
The next day at school, Capang arrived at school early and returned everything he had borrowed from his classmates.
我今天七點到學校。: 隔天上學，Capang很早就到學校了，他把跟同學借的東西都還給同學們。

sumungar kana lralrang i Capang, di marengay da yaada ku lra kanangku eman diya nu masalr lra kema. di sumungar diya kana lralrang da kinadaman diya na muwai pavelas kanintaw da eman diya.
Capang apologized to the students and said that he would definitely bring his own things in the future, and thanked the classmates for their willingness to lend him things before.
我今天七點到學校。: Capang向同學們道歉，並說他以後一定會自己帶東西，也謝謝同學們之前願意借他東西。

mau na pararawa i dekalr ni malri.
My dad is a hunter of the tribe.
我今天七點到學校。: 我的爸爸是部落的獵人。

makiteng ku diya mu, i malri di i ama na maralrak kani malri, nu ’aremeng mukakuwa i calun, miinada da tadaw di kuwang.
When I was little, my dad and uncle would go out at night with hunting knives and guns.
我今天七點到學校。: 我小的時候，爸爸和叔叔會在晚上去野外，帶著獵刀和獵槍。

nu ’uninan lra mu, tu adayaw nantu rawa puruma’.
At daybreak, they returned with their prey.
我今天七點到學校。: 天亮時，他們就會帶著獵到的獵物回來。

nu eman mau na vavuy, nu eman mau na rava, nu eman mirawa da tuu’.
Sometimes it was a boar, sometimes a flying squirrel, and occasionally a pheasant.
我今天七點到學校。: 有時候是山豬、有時候是飛鼠，偶爾也會獵到雉雞。

tu karelrawalrawa’ay i salikid kana dekalr, pu’acar kana dinkalranan.
They would divide the prey at the entrance of the village and share it with the tribe.
我今天七點到學校。: 他們會在村口將獵物分好，分享給族人。

marayas ku makiwalray kani malri, maranger ku kurelrang mukuwa pa’alrupa.
Every time I quarreled with my father, I wanted to go hunting with my father.
我今天七點到學校。: 我每次都會吵著爸爸，要跟著爸爸去打獵。

nu ma’idang ku lra tuy pilralrangaw ku lra mukuwa kema i malri.
Dad said that he would take me with me when I grew up.
我今天七點到學校。: 爸爸說我長大了他會帶我一起去。

na ma’inayan i dekalr sayhu penecir da rawa, sayhu demaway da putiru’an di cine’ece’an da varasa’ na pecir.
The men of the tribe also trap their prey, making lasso traps and rock traps.
我今天七點到學校。: 部落的男人也會用陷阱抓獵物，他們會製作套索陷阱和石壓式陷阱。

sayhu demaway i malri kana putiru’an na pecir, marengay i malri mu, ini mau na ’a’evangen kana tuu’, ta tarena’uway tu dinapalran na rawa, na pecir mu ta ca’anay kanantu kakalrangan na dalan kema.
My dad is very good at making lasso traps. Dad said that this is used to catch pheasants. We have to carefully observe the footprints of the prey, and the traps should be placed on the path of the prey.
我今天七點到學校。: 我的爸爸很會製作套索陷阱，爸爸說，這是用來捕抓雉雞的，我們要仔細觀察獵物的腳印，陷阱要放在獵物走的路上。

kana ku marangeran pakunamun kurelrang kana ma’idangan mukuwa pa’alrupa, kana wariwari diya menadanadam ku demaway kana pecir. adi sawariyan nangku pecir tatena’ pateka lra rawa.
In order to go hunting with adults as soon as possible, I practiced making traps every day, and soon my traps can really catch prey.
我今天七點到學校。: 為了想要趕快跟長輩一起去打獵，我每天練習製作陷阱，很快地我的陷阱就真的抓到獵物了。

mena’u lra i malri mu, marengay kaningku, nu kadaidan lra kamau u na tatena’ na pararawa kema.
Dad saw it and told me that I will be a very good hunter in the future.
我今天七點到學校。: 爸爸看到後對我說，你將來一定會是一個真正的獵人。

ma’idang ku lra harem, ku padekaw nangku kadalis di valru’, marelrang ku kani malri mukuwa pa’alrupa.
Now that I have grown up, I carry my bow and arrows and go hunting with my father.
我今天七點到學校。: 現在我長大了，我背起我的弓和箭矢，跟著爸爸一起去打獵。

muruma’ mi i dekalr mu, naniyam rawa niyam pu’acaranay kana dinkalranan.
When returning to the village, share the hunted prey with the tribe.
我今天七點到學校。: 回到部落時將獵到的獵物和族人們分享。

marengay i malri, sasungar ta kanantu ipuvati da temuwamuwan, tu iveray kanta da rawa karuwa ta diya lremawa’.
Dad said, we want to thank the ancestors for their blessings, so that we have a lot of prey to harvest.
我今天七點到學校。: 爸爸說，我們要感謝祖靈賜福，給我們的獵物還能夠分享 。

piwari ku lra mukuwa i kungkuwan a semavalr.
I was late for school this morning.
我今天七點到學校。: 我早上上學遲到了。

mukuwa ku i kungkuwan mu, malalup ku miinada daku ’aliyuc.
When I was going to school, I forgot to bring my backpack.
我今天七點到學校。: 去學校的時候，我忘了帶書包。

adi ku miinada da eman diya.
I didn't bring anything with me.
我今天七點到學校。: 我什麼東西都沒有帶。

temakakesi mi mu, marelrang ku kanangku lralrang mukasa mena’u da valray.
During class, I and my classmates read the textbook together.
我今天七點到學校。: 上課的時候，我和同學一起看課本。

semaseking mi mu, tu pavulasay ku da impic di aicur nangku lralrang.
During the exam, a classmate lent me a pen and an eraser.
我今天七點到學校。: 考試的時候，同學借我筆和橡皮擦。

marengay na sinsi kaningku
nu masalr lra mu
我今天七點到學校。: kasemavalr marahan
column5: The teacher told me, Wake up earlier next time and don't be late again!""
column6: 老師跟我說：「下次早點起床，不要再遲到了!」

i Amsing ku ’aliyan, alrak a Pinuyumayan.
My good friend’s name is Amsing, and he is also an Pinuyumayan child.
我今天七點到學校。: 我的好朋友叫Amsing，他也是卑南族的小孩。

mukasa mi temakesi kana dekalr i Kasavakan.
We study together in the Kasavakan tribe.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們一起在Kasavakan部落讀書。

malayas mi mukasa kingkinger datu vinavati na dawdawan da vativatiyan, sayhuwan mi lra kinger da tinaraKasavakan na vativatiyan.
We often listen to the elders telling stories together, and we both can speak the Kasavakan proficiently.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們常常一起聽耆老說故事，我們都很會聽建和語故事了。

alusu ku di valivaliw ku, i Amsing mu, tihasar di marekedang.
I am tall and overweight, while Amsing is short and thin.
我今天七點到學校。: 我很矮也很瘦，Amsing很高又很壯。

i Amsing mu, salaw dalikedik di sidalu da cau, sahar na cau diya kantaw.
Amsing is very energetic, and everyone likes him a lot.
我今天七點到學校。: Amsing健康對人又非常熱心，大家都很喜歡他。

undokay harem kana wari i kungkuwan, kasaduwan tu i parepakuwa i kungkuwan.
Today was the school's sports day, and the school organized many competitions.
我今天七點到學校。: 今天是學校的運動會，學校舉辦了許多競賽。

ulra na makedekedeng kana cali, na cemapi’i kana mali, pavekas, malikasaw, di papana’an.
There were tug of war, soccer, running, dancing, and archery.
我今天七點到學校。: 有拔河、足球、跑步、跳舞和射箭。

ma’ari’ari ku pavekas.
I participated in the running competition.
我今天七點到學校。: 我比賽跑步。

adu pavekas ku mu, kuretapelra’ ku, mudara’ pakirev ku tudu.
When I was running, I fell down, and my knees were bleeding.
我今天七點到學校。: 當時我跑步的時候，我跌倒了，膝蓋流了很多血。

aymu, marahan ku diya, adi ku madiyadi mungaway pavekas.
But I stood up and continued running forward.
我今天七點到學校。: 但我還站起來，不停向前跑。

meredek ku lra i raredekan mu, semangal na cau mapiya.
Everyone was happy when I reached the finish line.
我今天七點到學校。: 我到終點時所有人都很開心。

ara adiya ku muelak kana sanga mu, salaw ku semangal, alra puludus ku lra kana ma’ari’ari.
Although I didn't get first place, I'm glad because I completed the race.
我今天七點到學校。: 雖然沒有獲得第一名，但我很高興，因為我完成了比賽。

marelrang ku kani malri mukuwa mudadangiya kani temama Awi a adaman.
Yesterday, my father and I visited my uncle.
我今天七點到學校。: 昨天我和爸爸去拜訪Awi叔叔。

mupanana tu kuwi ni temama Awi.
My uncle injured his foot.
我今天七點到學校。: Awi叔叔的腳受傷了。

marengay kaniyam, tu sa’uv na ruma’ mu, ulra saya cavulang kema.
He told us that there was a hole in the roof of his house.
我今天七點到學校。: 他告訴我們，房子的屋頂破了一個洞。

tumulralre’ay kana sa’uv mu, mu’adulay di mutani lra kemay sawsa’uv.
He fell off the roof while repairing it.
我今天七點到學校。: 他在修理屋頂時，從屋頂滑一跤就掉下來了。

miinada da tiwngan a hung di puran i malri vaveray kani tamama Awi.
My father brought beef and betel nuts for my uncle.
我今天七點到學校。: 爸爸帶了牛肉和檳榔要給Awi叔叔的。

kadu mi kanantu vinseng madayadayar, kasaduwan tu vinavati pakinger kaniyam da vativatiyan.
My uncle and I chatted in the room, and he shared many stories.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們在他的房間聊天，他說給我們聽了很多故事。

muvavuruk mi mu, marengay i temama Awi da tihasar u lra di vangsar u lra kema kaningku.
Before I left, my uncle praised me for growing taller and becoming more handsome.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們正要離開時，叔叔對我說 你長高了又帥氣了。

tumuvang ku da ’’ lrayuwan! ama, nu ’inava lra nanu kuwi mu, kadika lra kaniyam mudadangiya mu! ’’ kema ku.
I said, When your foot gets better
我今天七點到學校。: come to our house next time and visit us.""
https://web.klokah.tw/text/sound/35821/5: 我回答：「謝謝！叔叔, 如果你的腳好了，也過來我們家玩喔！」我這麼說.

kana 2022’ami, na séhu paladuk da kayhiyan kana tu bibunsiyo na Yuéncumin karuwa putukasa puvalray da kangadanan.
In 2022, the government announced that indigenous identification cards can include tribal names separately.
我今天七點到學校。: 在2022年，政府召開了原住民身分證可單列族名的會議。

kiumalr ku kana vangsaran i dekalr i Lahay Ruvulreng, mau na pa’eceng lra kiami kana séhu da “putukasa da kangadanan” kananta bibunsiyo intaw.
I interviewed Lahay Ruvulreng, a young tribal member who has long been advocating for the inclusion of tribal names on identification cards.
我今天七點到學校。: 我訪問了部落青年Lahay Ruvulreng他是長期向政府爭取我們的身分證能「單列族名」的人。

marekuret mi kanini na kasede’an yawa ku kantaw kiumalra.
We had arranged to visit his home this holiday for the interview.
我今天七點到學校。: 我和他約定好這個假日到他家訪問他。

kiumaumalr ku mu, tu umalray ku kanantu kangadanan na ipakalrangan di tu adayaw ku pana’u kanantu saruma’ean di kanantu dekalr.
During the interview, he introduced to me the origin of his name and also introduced me to his family and tribe.
我今天七點到學校。: 在訪問的過程中，他向我介紹了他的名字的由來，也帶我認識了他的家人、他的部落。

kiumalr ku kanintaw man nu asalraw nanu ngadan, adi ’inava na maluman na puvalray diyamaw?
I asked him why he insisted on changing his name. Wasn’t the old registration method sufficient?
我今天七點到學校。: 我問他為什麼要改名，舊的登記方式不好嗎?

marengay kaningku, alra na tinararutiya na valray mu, adi maruwa penatedelr puvalray kanantu ngadan, di ulra na duma na cau “Lasinsen” kema mavina kanintaw, semalra malayas ki’apa’apa. kema.
He told me that using Chinese characters could not accurately convey his name, and others would still call him \La Xian Sheng
我今天七點到學校。: \" which resulted in many jokes being made."
https://web.klokah.tw/text/sound/35821/5: 他對我說，因為用中文字並不能準確的傳達他真正的名字，其他人還會叫他「拉先生」，也因此鬧出不少笑話。

marengay i Lahay Ruvulreng “na vinalrayan kananta valray na Yuéncumin mu, tatena’ mau nanta kangadanan. nangku ngadan pinucepa lra kananiyam mauwan, kananiyam pa’atayan, kananiyam inucauwan, ’inava nu kaduwan na cau tu acuvungaw nantu kangadanan. kema.
Lahay Ruvulreng said, \The names written in indigenous languages are our true names. My name represents our ethnic group
我今天七點到學校。: our family
https://web.klokah.tw/text/sound/35821/5: our identity. I hope more fellow tribespeople can reclaim their own names.\""
column5: Lahay Ruvulreng說：「原住民語書寫的名字才是我們真正的名字。我的名字代表了我們的族群、我們的家族、我們的身分，希望能有更多族人找回自己的名字。」

adaman marelrang ku kani mulri na vavayan mukuwa i iciba meniwana, i mulri na vavayan miinada da sadu tu sinaleman na kulakulang meniwan, di demeru diya da paakan kana ukiyakesang.
Yesterday, I went to the market with my grandmother to set up a stall. My grandmother brought a lot of vegetables that she grew herself and also prepared indigenous cuisine for everyone.
我今天七點到學校。: 昨天我跟奶奶去市集擺攤，奶奶帶了許多自己種的蔬菜去賣，也製作了原住民美食給客人吃。

sahar papiya na cau kantu naniwanan, na kamangulr di na lrusi kaduwan na cemacima’, kaduwan na duwa patalrama kanantu tinusiyaw ni mulri na vavayan.
Everyone loved my grandmother’s stall. Many people bought the chilis and Cane palm, and many people came to taste the dishes she cooked.
我今天七點到學校。: 大家很喜歡奶奶的攤位，辣椒和藤心很多人買，許多人來品嘗她煮的菜餚。

nantu dineru na pinuwayan kana mulingalingaw na kinavelas pukasa kana imaran, ulra diya na tiwngan a vavuy tinusiyaw kana lramumu, tu liwlran pukasa kana pasirep pukuwani da ukiyakesang, kaduwan na daduwa mutulik kananiyam naniwanan.
The Lima Bean and sticky rice she cooked were delicious, as well as the braised pork with maqaw pepper and wild boar meat. The flavors attracted many customers, and everyone lined up at our stall.
我今天七點到學校。: 她煮的放小莢豆的糯米飯非常好吃，還有用山豬肉煮的圓葉胡椒湯，味道非常吸引了客人，很多人都會來我們攤位排隊。

nu demaderu i mulri na vavayan, kadu ku i ngidilan tematuwap kicacevuk ku kana ukiyakesang. tamuni ku marengay da “nahni na kulakulang mau naniyam sinaleman, adi mi pakiwalay pucemel. pakunamun kadika cimima’” kemaku.
While my grandmother was cooking, I was on the side attracting customers. I shouted, \The vegetables are self-grown
我今天七點到學校。: all-natural and organic! Come and buy now!\""
https://web.klokah.tw/text/sound/35821/5: 當奶奶在煮東西的時候，我在旁邊招攬客人。我大聲說著：「蔬菜都是我們種的，沒有下任何藥物，趕快來買喔!」

naniyam emandiya adi repidan piya mi lra meniwan, marengay i mulri na vavayan “amau na ulra inu na pulraalrang” kema kaningku.
Our goods sold out quickly, and my grandmother said, \It’s all thanks to your help.\""
我今天七點到學校。: 我們的東西很快就賣完了，奶奶對我說：「都是因為有你的幫忙。」

ini na semasahar, kipanadam ku lra datu sinaleman di tu kadalraman da akanen na Yéncumin, di pinatalram ku lra datu ulepan na menaniwan i naniwanan.
Through this event, I learned about indigenous plants and food and experienced the hard work of running a stall.
我今天七點到學校。: 這個活動，我學到了有關原住民植物和食品的知識，並且體驗到了擺攤的辛苦。

mena’u ku lra kani mulri na vavayan kantu misaharan kana akanen a kinaawac pukasa asavak ku semangalan.
Seeing my grandmother’s passion for traditional food, I feel very proud and honored.
我今天七點到學校。: 看到了奶奶對傳統食物的熱愛，我深深感到特別高興。
